text: Would give this company less than one star if possible. Was charged $100 for someone to come out and give an estimate for redoing my deck. I wasn’t present for the “estimate”, but from my wife’s account it was wholly unprofessional. No measurements taken with the assurance that we would have an estimate by the end of the week. 2 weeks later no phone call, email, text or estimate and it’s clear this “company” is out to scam people. Beware!
author: Matthew Moglianesi
